author: djencks
msg: Move all role auto mapping to deploy time, and make more of it work.  There are still problems: DeploymentSupport is ignored, loginDomainName is the wrong name, and handling of GSR gbeans deployed in a war is unsatisfactory. This also changes the naming convention for GSR's from realm=name to name=name
